key_validation.recommendation: Naive 7-day Lag outperforms XGBoost (F1: 0.853 vs 0.646). Consider using Naive 7-day Lag or improving XGBoost.

persistence_comparison.recommendation: Persistence outperforms XGBoost (F1: 0.853 vs 0.646). Consider using Persistence or improving XGBoost.

seasonal_comparison.recommendation: XGBoost shows significant improvement over Seasonal (F1: 0.646 vs 0.291). Recommend using XGBoost.
